modName: Dragon plate armor better than Daedric
summary: Switch Dragonplate and Daedric armor values
descriptionHtml:
Dragon armor is the highest in the smithing perk tree. One would also argue than dragons are the most powerful creatures in Tamriel.
Well then, ever wondered why Daedric is still better?
Wonder no more because with this mod, this has been fixed! Dragonplate armor now offers as much protection as Daedric armor used to, and vice versa.

TL;DR: Dragonplate armor is now better than Daedric :)

Edit: this affect Dragonplate and Daedric shields as well
author: Nymod
